block.p: National League MONTREAL EXPOS--Agreed to terms with RHP Justin Wayne.

National Basketball Association UTAH JAZZ--Signed G DeShawn Stevenson. Women's National Basketball Association WASHINGTON MYSTICS--Announced the resignation of Nancy Darsch, coach. Named Darrell Walker interim coach.
National League MONTREAL EXPOS--Agreed to terms with RHP Justin Wayne.

National Basketball Association UTAH JAZZ--Signed G DeShawn Stevenson. Women's National Basketball Association WASHINGTON MYSTICS--Announced the resignation of Nancy Darsch, coach. Named Darrell Walker interim coach.

National Football League CHICAGO BEARS--Announced the resignation of Bryan Harlan, director of public relations. Promoted assistant director of public relations Scott Hagel to director of public relations. DALLAS COWBOYS--Agreed to terms with CB Kareem Larrimore, CB Mario Edwards and RB Michael Wiley. DENVER BRONCOS--Signed RB Mike Anderson. INDIANAPOLIS COLTS--Signed RB Abdul-Karim al-Jabbar, LB Dwight Hollier and WR Jermaine Copeland. Placed LB Nate Stimson and TE Joe Dean Davenport on the reserve-did not report list. JACKSONVILLE JAGUARS--Signed WR R. Jay Soward to a five-year contract. PHILADELPHIA EAGLES--Signed C John Romero to a three-year contract and WR Michael Lewis to a one-year contract. SEATTLE SEAHAWKS--Signed TE Rufus French to a one-year contract.

National Hockey League ATLANTA THRASHERS--Agreed to terms with D Adam Burt and F Denny Lambert. NASHVILLE PREDATORS--Signed C Greg Johnson. NEW JERSEY DEVILS--Signed D Mike Commodore. PHILADELPHIA FLYERS--Signed D Brad Tiley to a multiyear contract. ST. LOUIS BLUES--Signed G Dwayne Roloson. Re-signed D Todd Reirden. TAMPA BAY LIGHTNING--Signed LW Alexander Kharitonov and C Thomas Ziegler.

ARKANSAS--Named Kelly Bond women's assistant basketball coach. FRANKLIN & MARSHALL--Named Edward Haas sports information director. NORTH CAROLINA CENTRAL--Name Phil Spence men's basketball coach. NOTRE DAME--Named Mike Brey, men's basketball coach. PLYMOUTH STATE--Announced the resignation of Steve Bamford, athletic director, to become assistant commissioner of the Eastern College Athletic Conference. TEXAS TECH--Named Toby Rens women's assistant volleyball coach. THE CITADEL--Named Les Robinson athletic director.
